verbs.description: The exact nature of a hush money payment from President Donald Trump 's attorney to a porn star [V: was] once again brought into sharp focus Wednesday by the release of Trump 's annual financial filing with the Office of Government Ethics .

[ARG1: The exact nature of a hush money payment from President Donald Trump 's attorney to a porn star] was [ARGM-TMP: once again] [V: brought] [ARG3: into sharp focus] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG0: by the release of Trump 's annual financial filing with the Office of Government Ethics] .
